channel.title: nvidia-docker on fly away, chase dream
channel.description: Recent content in nvidia-docker on fly away, chase dream

item.title: Centos7安装nvidia Dcoker
item.description: 安装NVIDIA-docker前最好先将已有的docker卸载掉 # 查看已经安装的 yum list installed |grep docker # 删除掉对应的docker yum -y remove *** 安装 NVIDIA-docker 2 distribution=$(. /etc/os-release;echo $ID$VERSION_ID) curl
